title: PTAD monthly payout to retirees soars to N1tn
description:
Nigeria’s PTAD reports its monthly pension payout to retirees under the Defined Benefit Scheme has surpassed N1 trillion since 2015, reforming the system.

Read More: https://punchng.com/ptad-monthly-payout-to-retirees-soars-to-n1tn/
content:
The Pension Transitional Arrangement Directorate says it has paid more than N1tn in monthly pensions to over 200,000 retirees under the Federal Governments Defined Benefit Scheme since 2015.
